analyzed: @90a / rgya gar skad du / a'arya tsa turdharma ni rde sha n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra / bod skad du /
translated: The Noble Great Vehicle Sūtra

original: 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: The Teaching of the Four Dharmas

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas. Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na dge slong lnga brgya tha ma pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te; de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na dge slong lnga brgya tha ma pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te; de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, in the Sudharmā assembly hall, together with a great saṅgha of five hundred monks, and with a great many bodhisattva mahāsattvas, such as Maitreya and Mañjuśrī. Then the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya:

original: byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @90b po chos bzhi dang ldan na /
analyzed: byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @90b po chos bzhi dang ldan na /
translated: Maitreya, if bodhisattva mahāsattvas have four qualities,

original: sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will overcome the misdeeds they have done and accumulated.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang / gnyen po kun tu spyod pa dang / sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang / rten gyi stobs so //
analyzed: rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang / gnyen po kun tu spyod pa dang / sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang / rten gyi stobs so //
translated: the practice of remorse, the practice of remedies, the power of restoration, and the power of reliance.

original: de la rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa ni /
analyzed: de la rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa ni /
translated: Regarding those, the practice of remorse is as follows.

original: mi dge ba'i las spyad na de la 'gyod pa mang ba yin no //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las spyad na de la 'gyod pa mang ba yin no //
translated: If one engages in nonvirtuous actions, one has a lot of regret about that.

original: de la gnyen po kun tu spyod pa ni /
analyzed: de la gnyen po kun tu spyod pa ni /
translated: Regarding that, the practice of remedies is as follows.

original: mi dge ba'i las byas nas kyang dge ba'i las la shin tu brtson pa'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las byas nas kyang dge ba'i las la shin tu brtson pa'o //
translated: Even though one has done nonvirtuous actions, one is very diligent in virtuous actions.

original: de la sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni /
analyzed: de la sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni /
translated: Regarding that, the power of restoration is as follows.

original: sngom pa yang dag par blangs pas mi phyed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'am //
analyzed: sngom pa yang dag par blangs pas mi phyed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'am //
translated: Through taking up the vows, one obtains an indivisible vow.

original: de la rten gyi stobs ni /
analyzed: de la rten gyi stobs ni /
translated: Regarding that, the power of reliance is as follows.

original: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste /
translated: Taking refuge in the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha; and not abandoning the mind of awakening.

original: de stobs dang ldan pa la brten pas sdig pas zil gyis gnon par mi nus so //
analyzed: de stobs dang ldan pa la brten pas sdig pas zil gyis gnon par mi nus so //
translated: Because of relying on these powerful [factors], evil cannot overpower [the bodhisattva].

original: byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
analyzed: byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
translated: Maitreya, if bodhisattva-mahāsattvas possess these four dharmas,

original: sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will overpower evil that has been done and accumulated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mdo 'di rtag tu bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mdo 'di rtag tu bklag par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva should always read this sūtra,

original: kha ton du bya'o //🔽bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: kha ton du bya'o // bsam par bya'o //
translated: recite it,🔽contemplate it,

original: bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya'o //
translated: meditate on it,

original: mang du bya'o //
analyzed: mang du bya'o //
translated: and make it widely known.

original: des na nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, evil conduct will be unable to produce results.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces @91a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces @91a *//
translated: The Blessed One said this...

original: bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: Having spoken thus, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya, those bhikṣus, those bodhisattvas, those sons of gods headed by Śakra, and the entire assembly rejoiced and praised what the Blessed One had said.

original: 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Great Vehicle sūtra The Teaching of the Four Dharmas is completed.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
